hadiths.text: Bahz bin Hakim reported on the authority of his father from his grandfather (Mu'awiyah ibn Haydah) as saying:I said: Messenger of Allah, how should we approach our wives and how should we leave them? He replied: Approach your tilth when or how you will, give her (your wife) food when you take food, clothe when you clothe yourself, do not revile her face, and do not beat her. Abu Dawud said: The version of Shu'bah has: That you give her food when you have food yourself, and that you clothe her when you clothe yourself

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي حَقِّ الْمَرْأَةِ عَلَى زَوْجِهَا
chapter.eng-name: The Rights Of A Woman Upon Her Husband
